forum_id.description: The unique identifier of the forum where the discussion topic is posted.

hits.description: The number of times the discussion topic has been viewed.

id.description: The unique identifier of the discussion topic.

locked.description: Indicates if the discussion topic is locked and no further replies can be added.

merged_topic_id.description: The ID of the topic to which this topic is merged if it's a merged topic.

message.description: The main content or message of the discussion topic.

posts_count.description: The total number of posts or replies in the discussion topic.

replied_by.description: The user or agent who last replied to the discussion topic.

stamp_type.description: Type of stamp applied to the discussion topic.

sticky.description: Indicates if the discussion topic is pinned or sticky in the forum.

title.description: The title or subject of the discussion topic.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the discussion topic.

user_votes.description: The number of votes or likes received by the discussion topic.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the discussion topic was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the discussion topic was last updated.
